Review Text: Lovely apartment with friendly reception staff ( Esther and Doris) who made our stay memorable. Stayed in the one bedroom which also had a sofa bed in the living area. Only downside was the noise from the pool party on one of the nights. Otherwise, highly recommended.

I stayed at the Cata Apartment Hotel during my latest trip to Nigeria in February 2015. I was very impressed with the cleanliness and amenities of the hotel. It's location is very close and central to the airport. The hotel staff were very courteous. I booked a double bed room with two adults. We were supposed to be served free breakfast, which was included in the price of the room. I was surprised when told that only one adult gets free breakfast, and we have to pay for the other adult. I insisted that the reservation was for two adults, and both have to get free breakfast. The staff contacted the manager, and we both had our free breakfast. Besides this incident, we were satisfied with the service. Their breakfast was good.
Room Tips: The free wi fi didn't work because of network issue.

Review Text: This hotel is my home away from home each time I travel to Nigeria. The management and staff are very courteous, friendly and warm, security is personable The property and accommodation is immaculate bedding towels are changed daily You also have the convenience of 24 hours room service from the kitchen and bar.  I highly recommend this hotel.

Review Title: Yellow Tulip Courtyard, Nice hotel at a good rate
Review Text: For my first time in Lagos, I felt safe in this hotel. Everybody was very courteous, very helpful and with friendly faces. This hotel is not well known but should be as it is at a good rate compare to some overpriced hotel. My daughter enjoyed the pool as it was over 30 degrees when we went, The food was excellent. Bonne chance aux proprietaires, well done and If I were to come back to Lagos, I d go back to Yellow Tulip Courtyard.

Review Text: The staff are courteous and flexible. Only stayed for one night as I was in transit, but wished I could stay longer.
